name: Slide Puzzle Life
description:
Simple, fun, addictive, free puzzle game.

The concept of the game is really simple. Just tap any of the blocks that is placed next to the empty space to move it. Keep sliding the boxes until they will create the final image.

You can select 4 different difficulties that determine the number of blocks on the board (3x3, 4x4, 5x5 and 6x6). You can also select what kind of image you would like to play with. All amazing photos from 5 different places all over the world images were taken by us during our trips around the world :)

Check all combinations and try to find your favourite! Now relax, play and have fun!
